author: @ddpwe5269
text: You can just make it so Chrome opens the same tabs you were last working in.  Settings --> Startup --> Continue where you left off.  Never have to bookmark or re-open closed tabs once re-launching.  In Windows that is.

author: @abeibrahim5846
text: YOU FORGOT TO SAY "THIS OPTION IS ONLY AVAILABLE IN iOS".

author: @mrinmaysarkar8754
text: Thanks sir. I am from india.

author: @jfish3576
text: another method that I use fairly often is to quit Chrome entirely (with tabs still open) and reopen them the next day via Chrome Menu --> History --> 16 Tabs --> Restore All Tabs.

author: @arsenalkarim2253
text: Using Chrome for a long time and didn't know that. Tks man
